text: Six P.M. () is a 1944 Soviet drama movie directed by Ivan Pyryev.Что подготовили телеканалы к Параду Победы и Дню памяти и скорбиВ шесть часов вечера после войны (1944) It stars Marina Ladynina, Ivan Lyubeznov, and Yevgeny Samoylov. ==Actors== *Marina Ladynina - Varia Pankova *Ivan Lyubeznov - Lieutenant Pavel Demidov *Yevgeny Samoylov - senior lieutenant Vasily Kudryashov *Ariadne Lisak - Fenya, Varia's friend *Elena Savitskaya - Aunt Katya, building manager *Yevgeny Morgunov - artilleryman *Mikhail Pugovkin - artilleryman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1944 romantic drama movies Category:1944 musical movies Category:Soviet romance movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet musical movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Pyryev
title: Six P.M.
